subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: D.C. United increased its lead to 5 points in Major League Soccer’s Eastern Conference with a 2-1 victory over the San Jose Earthquakes on Friday night in Santa Clara, Calif.
snippet: D.C. United increased its lead to 5 points in Major League Soccer’s Eastern Conference with a 2-1 victory over the San Jose Earthquakes on Friday night in Santa Clara, Calif.
